verify.name: Verify sndconfig version

steps.title: Configure Sound Card Settings Using sndconfig

verify.name: Verify sound card configuration
verify.hint: Please ensure that the sound card configuration is working correctly. You should be able to hear the test sound when running `sudo sndconfig --test`.

verify.name: Verify sound card detection
verify.hint: Please ensure that the sound card is properly detected by the system. The output of `sudo sndconfig --list` should include the "Intel 82801AA-ICH" sound card.
